name: Responsive layout [Stylish for Chrome]
description: Don't install this - it won't do a thing until the next update of Stylish for Chrome. Then, it will only work for Stylish for Chrome. In small windows, the controls that are usually fixed at the left side of the window become a header at the top of the window. They're also scrunched together a little so that you can see more of the content.
additional_info: The style is active in windows that are less than 640px wide. Wider windows use the default layout. Only element positions change; size, color, font etc. are the same.
